title: HoP 388 - Just Add Salt - Paracelsus and Alchemy
itunes:title: HoP 388 - Just Add Salt - Paracelsus and Alchemy
description: Paracelsus adapts the tradition of alchemical science for use in medicine, and in the process overturns the scientific theories of Aristotle and Galen.
